Posts.Content: Jul 15, 2011 08:28AM ck2d wrote: I had a benign tumor removed when I was 23.  I know how insane with worry you must be.  Hang in there - keep moving forward and you will get through this. I'd look into getting some help with the expenses since you don't have insurance.  Check with the hospital you are using; they probably have income based rates.  Don't let the expense stop you. Yeah, it could be a cyst.  But you've got to take the next step and find out what it is.  Has the doctor suggested any tests?  Whatever they are, do them.  Get an answer so you don't have to worry about it anymore.  Good luck!
Posts.Title: Breast lump @ 27, strong family history Lavender250 del4
